params.offset: The offset up to which events have been processed.

params.source: The source identifier of the change.

returns.eventId: A unique identifier for this event.
returns.offset: The offset at which the event was stored.

params.maxCount: The maximum number of events to return.

returns.events: The array of stream events in the range.

params.fromOffset: The offset to begin reading from.

returns.subscriptionId: The unique identifier for the subscription.

acknowledge(bytes32,uint256).notice: Acknowledges that a consumer has processed events up to a given offset.

append(string,bytes,bytes,bytes32).notice: Appends a new change event to the stream.

getNextOffset().notice: Returns the next offset that will be assigned.

read(bytes32,uint256).notice: Reads events from a subscription up to a maximum count.

subscribe(uint256).notice: Creates a subscription starting from a given offset.
